pr_title: [no ticket][risk=no] Unit test enhancements and small refactorings for new interceptor

timeline.bodyText: questions is RequestTimeMetricInterceptor just a new rename for  ElapsedTimeDistributionInterceptor ? i cannot see it being removed as a file in this PR.
timeline.author: NehaBroad

replies.bodyText: Good catch. Somehow I wound up adding instead of renaming.
replies.author: jaycarlton

timeline.bodyText: Also it will be good to  add comments to explain whats happening in this method
timeline.author: NehaBroad

timeline.message: remove duplicated file and add comments
